Note.Notes: Breakfast meals are critical for nutritional balance and should contain high-fiber, vitamin-rich foods like fresh milk and bread. Lunch options like Chicken Rice from Choh Dee Place are cost-effective and nutritious, complemented by Kopi O for an energy boost. Dinner options such as Fishball Noodle Soup provide protein and essential nutrients. Snacks are included to curb hunger pangs and provide a balanced diet. Healthcare costs are estimated based on daily medication needs. Transportation costs are calculated for short, necessary trips around the local area, avoid unnecessary spending. Leisure and other activities are budgeted carefully to ensure enjoyment without compromising essential needs. Reserve and emergency funds provide a safety net for unforeseen expenses. A mix of fresh produce like eggs and low-fat yoghurt is recommended for supermarket purchases to maintain health.
